name: First International Conference on Electrical Energy and Power Engineering 2020
content: ICEEPE 2020 is organized by the Renewable Energy and Energy Management division of Universiti Teknologi MARA, Cawangan Pulau Penang, Malaysia. ICEEPE 2020 will be held at The Light Hotel, Penang, Malaysia during 25 – 26, August 2020\. Publications: All the accepted and registered papers of ICEEPE 2020 will be published in the IOP: Materials Science and Engineering (a conference proceedings journal) which is indexed in CPCI – Web of Science (Clarivate Analytics), SCOPUS, Inspec, International Nuclear Information System (INIS), NASA – ADS, Chemical Abstracts, Polymer Library, etc. Please submit your full length papers to iceepe2020@gmail.com
